name: Project Impact/Effort Template
description:
Based off the action priority matrix, this is a quick project management tool to help prioritize projects based on impact and effort.


Add individual projects or tasks then place them on the matrix based on their impact and effort. They may fall in one of these categories:

  • Quick Win: low hanging fruit
  • Major Project: long term returns, require strategy & planning
  • Small Project: Fill-in that isn't necessary
  • Quick Task: potential time waster
